Room.Name: Green Goat Inn
Room.ShortDescription: This is a dirty little bar run by a dirty little dwarf.
Room.LongDescription: Rum is the only thing they sell, so if you want to drink anything else you had best be going. Besides, why did the music stop when you came in? A lot of sullen looks seem to be directed toward you, and you notice a couple of young dwarves over at the side appear to be fingering their knives. A snot-nosed and giggling troll seems to have blocked the exit.
